QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Stereotactic radiosurgery - Gamma Knife
QAPair.Answer: Stereotactic radiosurgery (SRS) is a form of radiation therapy that focuses high-power energy on a small area of the body. Despite its name, radiosurgery is not actually a surgical procedure -- there is no cutting or sewing, rather it is a radiation therapy treatment technique. More than one system is used to perform radiosurgery. This article is about Gamma Knife radiosurgery.
